body.p: Horizon is the web GUI for administering your cloud deployment.
body.note: Horizon in HPE Helon OpenStack 3.0 is pre-configured to support only the v3 Keystone API. If you upgrade from HPE Helon OpenStack 2.x to 3.0 you will be automatically be migrated to the Keystone v3 API for Horizon use. If you still want to use the Keystone v2 API, you will be limited to API/CLI use only as there is no Horizon support for the Keystone v2 API in HPE Helon OpenStack 3.0.

section.title: Accessing Horizon
section.p: If your administrator set a hostname value for external_name in your network_groups.yml file during the configuration process for your cloud then Horizon will be accessed over port 443 (https) on that hostname.
